shortDescription.default: A package with webparts created for all SPO developers in MSF. Made by MSF SITS team.

longDescription.default: This package includes webparts create for all SPO site designers in MSF. Presently there are 2 webpart - 1) Welcome user (MSF) which can help you to create a simple welcome message, 2) Button (MSF) which give SPO designers much more visual options than standard SPO Button or Quick Links webpart.

features.title: MSF webparts package
features.description: The feature that activates elements of the msf-webparts solution.
